title: Segmentation fault (core dumped) after iterated for thousands of time
body_html:
that BUG happen after I had trained for more than 5000 iterators
at first it's all right.
it reports Segmentation fault (core dumped)
and this is the stack trace:
Thread 258769 "python" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff40fff700 (LWP 27775)]
0x00007fffdf84f447 in THRandom_random ()
from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
(gdb) bt
#0 0x00007fffdf84f447 in THRandom_random ()
from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
#1 0x00007fffdf84f4a9 in THRandom_random64 ()
from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
#2 0x00007fffdf84f61a in THRandom_normal ()
from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
#3 0x00007fffdf567120 in THFloatTensor_normal ()
from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
#4 0x00007fffedaa301a in THPFloatTensor_stateless_randn (
self=, args=, kwargs=)
at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1518238409320/work/torch/csrc/generic/TensorMethods.cpp:59471
#5 0x00007ffff7a42773 in PyObject_Call ()
from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/bin/../lib/libpython2.7.so.1.0
#6 0x00007fffed6c7892 in THPUtils_dispatchStateless (tensor=0x5555562caa00,
name=0x7fffee758dd1 "randn", args=0x7fffa4402f80, kwargs=0x0)
at torch/csrc/utils.cpp:160
#7 0x00007ffff7adc615 in PyEval_EvalFrameEx ()

config

  • PyTorch or Caffe2:pytorch
  • OS:Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS
  • PyTorch version:pytorch-0.3.1
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):conda
  • Python version:2.7
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:cuda8.0/7.0.5
  • GPU models and configuration:GeForce GTX 1080Ti NVIDIA-SMI 390.25 Driver Version: 390.25

In addition, including the following information will also be very helpful for us to diagnose the problem:

  • A script to reproduce the bug. Please try to provide as minimal of a test case as possible.
  • Error messages and/or stack traces of the bug
  • Context around what you are trying to do

Thanks for any help or suggestions about it.

body:
that BUG happen after I had trained for more than 5000 iterators
at first it's all right.
it reports Segmentation fault (core dumped)
and this is the stack trace:
Thread 258769 "python" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff40fff700 (LWP 27775)]
0x00007fffdf84f447 in THRandom_random ()
   from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007fffdf84f447 in THRandom_random ()
   from /home/ygh/.conda/envs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
